game.shortDescription: 「CAPCOM FIGHTING COLLECTION」시리즈 제2탄!「Capcom vs. SNK 2: Mark of the Millennium 2001」, 「Project Justice」 등의 격투 타이틀에 더해 3D 대전 액션 「Power Stone」, 「Power Stone 2」 등 굴지의 명작 총 8 타이틀을 수록!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Capcom's new fighting collection hits the stage! Choose from fan-favorite games like Capcom vs. SNK 2: Mark of the Millennium 2001 and Project Justice to 3D action games like Power Stone and Power Stone 2 in this collection of eight classic fighting games!
